file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-34-01-04 - CONFIG-1 - PRA REMOTE COMPUTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PRA REMOTE COMPUTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the prerecorded announcement remote computer (PRA remote computer). B. The PRA remote computer is installed in the forward galley, zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH PRA 23-34-01-000-801-A PRA REMOTE COMPUTER - REMOVAL SYSTEM AIRCRAFT WITH PRA PRA REMOTE COMPUTER - INSTALLA- 23-34-01-400-801-A SYSTEM TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 23-34-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-34-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM 2. PRA REMOTE COMPUTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the PRA remote computer. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-005-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • PRA (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/PRA). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-005-A (1) Open the door to get access to the door flap (5). (2) Remove the screws (3) and washers (4). (3) Carefully lower the door flap (5) to get access to the PRA remote computer (6). (4) Remove the screws (10) of the flat cable connector (9). (5) Disconnect the flat cable connector (9) from the PRA remote computer (6). (6) Remove the screws (12) of the electrical connector (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (7) Disconnect the electrical connector (11) from the PRA remote computer (6). (8) Release the screws (2) of the electrical connector (1). (9) Disconnect the electrical connector (1) from the PRA remote computer (6). (10) Remove the screws (7) and washers (8) that attach the PRA remote computer (6) to the door flap (5). (11) Remove the PRA remote computer (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM PRA Remote Computer Figure 401 ZONE 232 A B DOOR (REF.) DET. A 11. ELECTRICAL 12. SCREW (2) CONNECTOR 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 10. SCREW (2) 2. SCREW (2) 3. SCREW (6) 9. FLAT CABLE CONNECTOR 4. WASHER (6) 8. WASHER (4) 5. DOOR FLAP 7. SCREW (4) 6. PRA-REMOTE COMPUTER DET. B 145AMM230204.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-34-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM 3. PRA REMOTE COMPUTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the PRA remote computer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-34-00-700-801-A/500 PRA SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-005-A (1) Put the PRA remote computer (6) in position. (2) Install the screws (7) and washers (8) that attach the PRA remote computer (6) to the door flap (5). (3) Connect the electrical connector (1) to the PRA remote computer (6). (4) Attach the screws (2) of the electrical connector (1). (5) Connect the electrical connector (11) to the PRA remote computer (6). (6) Install the screws (12) of the electrical connector (11). (7) Connect the flat cable connector (9) to the PRA remote computer (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (8) Install the screws (10) of the flat cable connector (9). (9) Carefully lift the door flap (5). (10) Install the screws (3) and washers (4). (11) Close the door. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-005-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • PRA (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/PRA). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) Do the PRA System Operational Test ( AMM TASK 23-34-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
